Package controller

Class MainForm

java.lang.Object
controller.MainForm
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainForm extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
A controller that handles main menu of application.

  • Constructor Details

    • MainForm

      public MainForm()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Populates part and product table fields with information from user generated objects. Additionally, tables can be populated with test data if Inventory.loadTestData = true.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • onAddParts

      public void onAddParts​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Switches to AddPartForm when user clicks "Add" button underneath part table.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onPartModify

      public void onPartModify​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Switches to modifyPartForm when user clicks "Modify" button underneath part table. Part ID of part being clicked is fetched and assigned to Inventory.modifyId this ID is used in modifyPartForm to know which part to alter.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onPartDelete

      public void onPartDelete()
      Deletes selected part from list. Asks user to confirm deletion. Will notify user if deletion fails to execute.

    • onProductAdd

      public void onProductAdd​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Switches to AddProductForm when user clicks "Add" button underneath product table.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onProductModify

      public void onProductModify​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Switches to modifyProductForm when user clicks "Modify" button underneath product table. Product ID of product being clicked is fetched and assigned to Inventory.modifyId this ID is used in modifyProductForm to know which product to alter.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onProductDelete

      public void onProductDelete()
      Deletes selected product from list. Asks user to confirm deletion. Will notify user if deletion fails to execute. Products with associated parts will not be deleted.

    • onSearchParts

      public void onSearchParts()
      Activated when user types in search box. Fills part table with result of search. If search box is empty, table goes back to original state. Uses lookup function from the Inventory class.

    • onSearchProducts

      public void onSearchProducts()
      Populates product table with results of user's search. Uses lookup function from Inventory class. Triggers when interacting with search box.

    • loadAllParts

      public void loadAllParts()
      Fetches all parts in existence, loads them into table. Will also load test data if Inventory.loadTestData = true.

    • loadAllProducts

      public void loadAllProducts()
      Fetches all products in existence, loads them into table. Will also load test data if Inventory.loadTestData = true.

    • onExit

      public void onExit()
      Close application with exit code 0. Activated when user clicks "Exit" button.
